name: Rabbit Rancher
description:
In Rabbit Rancher, you play as a bunny stationed on an asteroid. For the next 100 days, your job is to harvest as many crops as possible before returning to the main colony.

Controls WASD to move
Left Mouse Button to pickup items
Middle Mouse Button to drop items
"I" to open the inventory
"ESC" to open pause menu
"E" to interact
"G" can advance the day Rabbit Rancher is still in development!

Made for the ☆Space Bunny Jam☆ by:

Marisa Elliott

Nelson Wu

Kelvin Cheng

Chris Kwon
